CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 3, 1966. pg. 13A, reads: "Tom Thumb Wedding - When these cute youngsters appeared in a 'Tom Thumb' wedding recently at Union Baptist Church, the affair was such a success that Mrs. Walter Williams, wife of the minister who directed the event, was requested to give a repeat performance. The next one is set for Dec. 22, at the Lemington Home for the Aged.  in miniature bridal party are left to right: Loyal Jasper Jr., Anthony Collins, Denese Jefferiers [Jefferies], Danita Williams, Darrell Simmons, Emily Ann Gray, Kenneth Elliot, Robert Goggins, groom; Darrell Williams (in back) minister; Carol Dillingham, bride; Teresa Strowder, McMahan Gray, Melanie Simmons, Loretta Strowder, Deborah Jefferies, Julius Hayworth and Dwanye Williams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Tom Thumb wedding, from left: Loyal Jasper Jr., Anthony Collins, Denese or Denise Jefferies, Danita Williams, Darrell Simmons, Emily Ann Gray, Kenneth Elliot, groom Robert Goggins, minister Darrell Williams in back, bride Carol Dillingham, Teresa Strowder, McMahan Gray, Melanie Simmons, Loretta Strowder, Deborah Jefferies, Julius Hayworth, and Dwanye Williams, posed in Union Baptist Church
